title: Crew Show (Caffeine & Carbs show, fun with decaf, MASSIVE Q&A session)
description:
Matt is back from the east coast where he drove the Jaguar and attended the Caffeine & Carburetors car show, which did not disappoint in the slightest. We talk about the incredible turnout, the cars, Glickenhaus' sales, Tesla heading to Germany, what the best "luxury rally car" is, replacing an S63AMG, GTO mods, Audi R8s, how a 911 stacks up against a Taycan, and much, much more. 

Head to https://www.Policygenius.com/smokingtire to get started right now. 

You get all the cars, one search. Check out https://www.AutoTempest.com/tst so they know we sent you. 

Use Off The Record! and ALWAYS fight your tickets! Enter code TST10 for a 10% discount on your first case on the Off The Record app, or go to https://off-the-record.sjv.io/c/2765520/1021446/13139 

Buy your Dillon optics sunglasses through our site and get a FREE Smoking Tire t-shirt. https://www.thesmokingtire.com 

Want early access to this episode? To watch the live stream? Bonus shows, or ad-free shows? Join our Patreon! Pro Driver patrons had access to this episode on 09/13/2021 Go to https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast and check out the tiers. It all starts at just $3/month!
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
